My Data Science Toolbox

Here is a list of my current go-to tools.

Data Manipulation:

  • pandas, numpy
  • Apache Spark
  • tidyverse
  • Microsoft Excel (for team members accustomed to pivot tables)

(Real-Time) Data Collection/Extraction:

  • SQL (Hive)
  • Apache Kafka

Data Storage:

  • parquet files
  • Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS)
  • SQL databases

Data Visualisation:

  • ggplot2
  • plotly (python API)

Machine Learning:

  • caret
  • scikit-learn

Documentation & Project Work:

  • R Markdown
  • Jupyter Notebooks
  • Confluence
  • Jira
  • Git
